channel.title: Black Mesa Autorun ISO
channel.description: Hello, I'm new here, and I've been working on a little project (very tiny, but useful). It is an autorunning burnable ISO of Black Mesa. It autoruns the unzipper, and installs it. Very simple, but some might want it. I'll upload a torrent when it is ready. Please help me seed, and maybe get the attention of the BM staff! If this is against any rules, or if you want me to change anything, just let me know! Thanks! :slight_smile:

item.title: Black Mesa Autorun ISO
item.dc:creator: newtzy33
item.description:
sersoft:

I made my own autorun.inf, it’s pretty easy open up Notepad and save a file as autorun.inf

in the file you write:

[autorun]
icon=setup.exe
open=setup.exe

I’ve been working on scripts lately, and I may actually expand this and make an installer of everything you need (Source SDK 07, Steam, etc…). The script now actually has names of the files, and I’m hoping to make it bigger. If you want to help me out eventually, with scripts, etc., just let me know!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Autorun ISO
item.dc:creator: newtzy33
item.description:
Hello, I’m new here, and I’ve been working on a little project (very tiny, but useful). It is an autorunning burnable ISO of Black Mesa. It autoruns the unzipper, and installs it. Very simple, but some might want it. I’ll upload a torrent when it is ready. Please help me seed, and maybe get the attention of the BM staff! If this is against any rules, or if you want me to change anything, just let me know! Thanks!
